Welcome to the GRAIL Lab

We are a dynamic research group at UNC Chapel Hill led by Prof. Shashank Srivastava. Our research lies in the intersection of machine learning and natural language processing with special interests in grounding language in perception, neuro-symbolic methods, and interactive machine learning. We are also a part of the larger UNC-NLP group at UNC CS.
